ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: getting started
ygData.msgSnippet: Okies I got the idea about where in the Bazaar to get the coffins. But beiing a DE already do I have to create a new char just to purchase stuff from the
ygData.messageBody:
Okies I got the idea about where in the Bazaar to get the coffins. But
beiing a DE already do I have to create a new char just to purchase stuff
from the Cleric Guild for my SK?

Cynfyn MacCulloch 49 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 22BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElfRngr
Oroblram 9HumanWar
Defender of the Faith
Saryn server
----- Original Message -----
From: "Nygaard, Jeff" <jeff.nygaard@...>


> If you go to the moon and go to the bazaar zone, just around the corner
from
> the banker is a row of venders. The first vernder sells peridots,
stackable
> coffins and non stackable coffins. The shadow knight and level 49 necro
> spell is the non stackable kind. The small stackable coffins are called
> Tiny Jaid Inlaid Coffin, not sure what the other one is called, but they
> will always be sold at the same place. They both look alike except 1 will
> have the small little number in the corner for how many you have. They
look
> like a long, narrow, light brown box. You can't miss them. Look at the
> price. I know the stackable ones cost approximately ~85 platinum and the
non
> stackable ones are ~175 platinum. iirc.
>
> Of course you could go to dark elf city and buy them from the cleric guild
> in the 3rd gate, just make a newbie, but then you have to transfer plat
and
> all that junk.
